name: Tides (JuudenkiJDK)
description:
A short non-interactive artistic experience. I don't know if this counts as a game aside from the fact it was made in Unity. But hey, it's a nice starter project I suppose!

Project by Juudenki

Somehow inspired by Gris

Special thanks to all the guys who make Unity tutorials on Youtube

Shoutout to my bf he is very cool
